alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued October 20 at 5:39PM AKDT until October 22 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to zero at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds gusting to 55 mph are causing blizzard conditions. Winds will increase to 65 mph tonight causing whiteout conditions. The strong winds and whiteout conditions will continue through Sunday. The strongest winds and worst conditions will be tonight and Saturday. Winds will gradually decrease on Sunday.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
